entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
